summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing negotiation for and purchase of easements required for the South Monroe Street Sanitary Sewer Project (L.I.D. Resolution 22823) to be constructed in the Northwest quarter of the Northwest quarter of Section 34, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., the Northeast quarter of the Northeast quarter of Section 33, Township 24 North, Range 4 East W.M., the Southeast quarter of the Southeast quarter of Section 28, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M. and the Southwest quarter of the Southwest quarter of Section 27 North, Township 24 North, Range 4 East, W.M., and making an appropriation from the Municipal Sewerage 1971 Construction Fund therefor.
